price: Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaremye ibiri kw’isi, maze Tubigira ibisharizo vyayo, Tunabigira ibintu ngirakamaro ku bayicumbitseko, kugira Tubagerageze haheze hamenyekane uwukora ivyiza ku bw’Imana Allah kurusha abandi, hamenyekane n’umunyavyaha ruhebuza, gutyo Tuzohembere umwe wese ivyo yakoze.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ زِينَةٗ لَّهَا لِنَبۡلُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗا

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā mā ʿalā al-arḍi zīnatan lahā linabluwahum ayyuhum aḥsanu ʿamalan
